name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior Software Engineer with over 10 years of experience in full stack development, proficient in **JavaScript**, **HTML**, and **CSS**. Demonstrated expertise in building multi-process architecture applications and skilled in performance profiling and memory debugging. Proven track record of delivering high-performance software solutions in healthcare and finance, utilizing a robust tech stack that includes **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Expert in developing cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, with substantial experience in leading enterprise platforms that incorporate AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics and intelligent decision-making. Solid background in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, committed to developing secure, maintainable solutions that adhere to compliance standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Additionally, brings hands-on experience in MLOps, including the development of ML pipelines and production workflows using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Passionate about creating systems that have a tangible impact on real-world challenges.
